amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the establishment of a program to make grants to States for the purpose of assisting States in carrying out organ donor awareness, public education and outreach activities and programs designed to increase the number of organ donors within the State, including living donors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 106-557 to provide a financial incentive for states to creatively tackle the challenges inherent in organ donation awareness and education; to authorize direct grants to states and allow partnerhsips with other public agencies or private sector institutions within states to mutually undertake organ donation activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barrett (WI) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
